title: Question 9
prompt: Based on Seth’s reaction to Jeremy getting in trouble with the police, if Bynum got arrested for jaywalking, how would Seth be most likely to react?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
In the passage, Seth gets upset with Jeremy for being in trouble with the police. He doesn’t want people who live at his boardinghouse to be in trouble. If Bynum got arrested, it would be a similar situation, with one of Seth’s boarders in trouble. Seth would likely act in a similar way, by warning Bynum to act respectably.


I told you when you come on here everybody know my house. Know these is respectable quarters. I don’t put up with no foolishness. Everybody know Seth Holly keep a good house. Was my daddy’s house. This house been a decent house for a long time.
